title: Orlando Trip Planning | Visitor Guides, Maps & Vacation Ideas
text: Planning Guides for Every Visitor Dial in the perfect experiences for every member of your group — from all-ages family fun to daring diversions for adults and everything in between. Unforgettable Experiences Explore Our Neighborhoods Planning Resources On-Demand Planning Make an appointment with our expert Vacation Planners to get free, personalized Orlando trip-planning assistance, including multilingual options. Get the App The Visit Orlando App has everything you need to get the most out of your Orlando vacation. Best of all, it is absolutely free. Facebook Connections Interact with other travelers, travel agents, influencers and Visit Orlando Vacation Planners courtesy of Visit Orlando’s Plan Your Vacation group. Get in Touch Our Vacation Planners are available via live chat, telephone and email. Save on Fun Get authorized discount tickets for top Orlando experiences, from theme parks and attractions to outdoor recreation, dinner shows and more. Powerful Resources Make your Orlando dreams come true with free, trusted trip-planning resources for building the perfect getaway. Fast Facts Check out useful facts and tips for maximizing your vacation, including getting around, sales tax, toll roads and visitor information. Transportation With so many transportation options, there is nothing standing between you and having the adventure of a lifetime in Orlando. U.S. Entry Requirements Coming to Orlando from another country? See the documentation you need to gain access to the Theme Park Capital of the World. More to Explore You will never run out of one-of-a-kind adventures in Orlando. See what else is waiting to amaze you.
